segment.source: Provider Policies Node
segment.target: Provider Policies Node

segment.source: Provider Policies Node
segment.target: Provider Policies Node

segment.source: Provider Policies Node
segment.target: Provider Policies Node

segment.source: The Provider Policies node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: The Provider Policies node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of provider policies.
segment.target: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of provider policies.

segment.source: Right-click the Provider Policies node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click the Provider Policies node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Provider Policy
segment.target: New Provider Policy

segment.source: Displays the New Provider Policy Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Provider Policy Wizard.

segment.source: This wizard consists of the following pages:
segment.target: This wizard consists of the following pages:

segment.source: Enter a name in the Provider Policy Name field.
segment.target: Enter a name in the Provider Policy Name field.

segment.source: Select the Manage client desktop using the Management Console check box if you want that capability.
segment.target: Select the Manage client desktop using the Management Console check box if you want that capability.

segment.source: Select one or both of the following check boxes if you want the associated functionality:
segment.target: Select one or both of the following check boxes if you want the associated functionality:

segment.source: Refresh publishing configuration when a user logs in
segment.target: Refresh publishing configuration when a user logs in

segment.source: Refresh configuration every.
segment.target: Refresh configuration every.

segment.source: After selecting this option, enter a number and select the unit from the drop-down menu.
segment.target: After selecting this option, enter a number and select the unit from the drop-down menu.

segment.source: Valid entries range from a minimum of 30 minutes to a maximum of 999 days.
segment.target: Valid entries range from a minimum of 30 minutes to a maximum of 999 days.

segment.source: Click Add or Remove to add or remove a group assignment.
segment.target: Click Add or Remove to add or remove a group assignment.

segment.source: Use the standard Windows Browse dialog box to find a user group.
segment.target: Use the standard Windows Browse dialog box to find a user group.

segment.source: Select one of the following check boxes on the Provider Pipeline Configuration dialog box to enable the associated feature:
segment.target: Select one of the following check boxes on the Provider Pipeline Configuration dialog box to enable the associated feature:

segment.source: Authentication—Select the type of authentication from the drop-down list.
segment.target: Authentication—Select the type of authentication from the drop-down list.

segment.source: Enforce Access Permission Settings
segment.target: Enforce Access Permission Settings

segment.source: Log Usage Information
segment.target: Log Usage Information

segment.source: Licensing—Select an enforcement scheme from the drop-down list.
segment.target: Licensing—Select an enforcement scheme from the drop-down list.

segment.source: Click Finish to add the new provider policy.
segment.target: Click Finish to add the new provider policy.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the view of the server.
segment.target: Refreshes the view of the server.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Server Management Console: Provider Policies Node
segment.target: Server Management Console: Provider Policies Node
